title: Preprocessing of Sentinel-2 Geo spatial Prithvi Crop Classification Data
author: Arya Sukumar
description: This asset helps user to pre-process the extracted Sentinel-2 data for using as input to Geo Spatial Prithvi Crop Classification model. Three time steps data downloaded will be required as input and it will give one data of size 224x224x16. This can be used for the inference task of Prithvi Geo Spatial Crop Classification task.
